alert.note: Alert for Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 8:08PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oktibbeha and southwestern Lowndes Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 808 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oktoc, or 8 miles southeast of Starkville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starkville, Sessums, Oktoc, Bent Oak and Artesia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
